00014 #ifndef ULIB_FILECONFIG_H
00015 #define ULIB_FILECONFIG_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/file.h>
00018 #include <ulib/container/hash_map.h>
00019 
00020 class U_EXPORT UFileConfig : public UFile {
00021 public:
00022 
00023         static UString* str_yes;
00024         static UString* str_file;
00025         static UString* str_string;
00026 
00027         static void str_allocate();
00028 
00029         // COSTRUTTORI
00030 
00031         UFileConfig()
00032                 {
00033                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UFileConfig, "", 0)
00034 
00035                 UFile::map      = (char*)MAP_FAILED;
00036                 UFile::st_size  = 0;
00037                 UFile::map_size = 0;
00038 
00039                 if (str_yes == 0) str_allocate();
00040                 }
00041 
00042         ~UFileConfig()
00043                 {
00044                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UFileConfig)
00045 
00046                 if (table.capacity())
00047                         {
00048                         table.clear();
00049                         table.deallocate();
00050                         }
00051                 }
00052 
00053         // SERVICES
00054 
00055         bool loadVector(UVector<UString>& vec);
00056         bool loadTable(UHashMap<UString>& table);
00057 
00058         bool loadTable() { return loadTable(table); }
00059 
00060         bool load(const char* section = 0, uint32_t len = 0);
00061 
00062         // section management
00063 
00064         bool skip();                                                            // skip space and line comment...
00065         char peek() { return _start[0]; }
00066 
00067         void reset()
00068                 {
00069                 U_TRACE(0, "UFileConfig::reset()")
00070 
00071                 _end    = data.end();
00072                 _size = (_end - _start);
00073                 }
00074 
00075         bool searchForObjectStream(const char* section = 0, uint32_t len = 0);
00076 
00077         // Wrapper for table
00078 
00079         UHashMap<UString> table;
00080 
00081         void clear()       {        table.clear(); }
00082         void deallocate()  {        table.deallocate(); }
00083         bool empty() const { return table.empty(); }
00084 
00085         UString      erase(const UString& key) { return table.erase(key); }
00086         UString operator[](const UString& key) { return table[key]; }
00087 
00088         // Facilities
00089 
00090         long readLong(const UString& key, long default_value = 0)
00091                 {
00092                 U_TRACE(0, "UFileConfig::readLong(%.*S,%ld)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(key), default_value)
00093 
00094                 UString value = table[key];
00095 
00096                 if (value.empty() == false) default_value = value.strtol();
00097 
00098                 U_RETURN(default_value);
00099                 }
00100 
00101         bool readBoolean(const UString& key)
00102                 {
00103                 U_TRACE(0, "UFileConfig::readBoolean(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(key))
00104 
00105                 bool result = (table[key] == *str_yes);
00106 
00107                 U_RETURN(result);
00108                 }
00109 
00110         // Open a configuration file
00111 
00112         bool open();
00113         bool open(const UString& path)
00114                 {
00115                 U_TRACE(0, "UFileConfig::open(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(path))
00116 
00117                 UFile::setPath(path);
00118 
00119                 return UFileConfig::open();
00120                 }
00121 
00122 #ifdef DEBUG
00123         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00124 #endif
00125

00127         UString data;
00128         const char* _end;
00129         const char* _start;
00130         uint32_t _size;
00131 
00132 private:
00133         UFileConfig(const UFileConfig&) : UFile()  {}
00134         UFileConfig& operator=(const UFileConfig&) { return *this; }
00135 };
